body:
Ramana.

I just found these two papers (by Martin and others) on this subject:


http://www.lrc.rpi.edu/programs/daylighting/rp_designguidelines.asp
(index)

http://www.lrc.rpi.edu/programs/daylighting/pdf/finalreport61905.pdf
(toplights)


http://www.lrc.rpi.edu/programs/daylighting/pdf/sidelighting.pdf
(sidelights)


Hth,
Thomas
